title: full_solar_light_visible_over_field
summary: Clear morning sunlight fully present over agricultural field area.
description: This record documents visual confirmation of full solar light availability at 08:07 after earlier insufficient power conditions. The image shows clear sky, strong sunlight, and uniform illumination over the field, confirming that solar conditions improved compared to earlier timeframes.

linked_references.note: Initial inverter restart attempt after sunrise.
Inverter abort due to insufficient power before full sunlight.

external_reference.note: Image shows clear sky and strong solar illumination across field.
